author: terencechain
content:
Quick update on my end. I have a branch that uses focil epoch and version but blocked on testing with Kurtosis because config does not understand `focil_fork_epoch or eip7805_fork_epoch`. Will work with <@199561711278227457> on this one...
```
Evaluation error: fail: Invalid parameter focil_fork_epoch for network_params. Allowed fields: ...
```
